items.name: Brand New Only
items.desc:
Brand New Only
Range: Augment
Style: India Pale Ale
ABV: 7.2%
We don’t know quite what it is, or how we do it, but there’s something special that happens with our IPAs once they hit that 7.2% mark. We love it so much that we only bring these big guns out once in a while, and joining Too Soon, Grow Deliver Repeat, and Spur in this exclusive club now comes Brand New Only.
An India Pale Ale that is pure and unmistakably Polly’s – smashing together the new school juice craze, with those old school aggressively hopped beers we grew up drinking ourselves, Brand New Only brings together Azacca and Chinook in the dry hop for an IPA that hits straight up with juicy mango notes before backing up this pillowy softness with old school bite on the finish. Pleasantly Polly’s.

items.name: Cahb
items.desc: You want the juice? We brought the juice! Sometimes you just need to take a look at the hops you have available in your store and go “I feel like making something really special”. Citra and Galaxy – need we say more. Pure orange sherbert on the nose, with fresh squeezed mango juice to boot. On the palate, Galaxy takes the stage and shows exactly why it’s one of the most sought-after hop varietals on the planet. Passionfruit, peach, and citrus notes a-plenty, paired up with huge mouthfeel thanks to the generous helping of oats in the mash. All wrapped up in a healthy lashing of LA3 for maximum suspension, this is exactly where we want our DIPAs to be.

items.name: Humming Error
items.desc: Everybody knows how much we love a super smashable pale here at Polly’s HQ, and everybody knows that Citra and Mosaic are the ultimate bff partnership. When we found our we were getting our hands on a bucketload of Loral hops here at the brewery it made the most sense to go for a full on flavour explosion of a three way dance with these incredible varietals. Citra and Mosaic bring a swagbag of juicy mango and passionfruit notes, but with the addition of Loral, a tonne of zingy lemon citrus notes come to the fore; accentuating the drinkability of this incredible pale ale.

items.name: Informal Edits
items.desc: IPA – the style without which we wouldn’t be here today. We are famous (or infamous, your call!) for our passion for paying homage to all things old school here at Polly’s – tipping a glass to the OG craft beer heroes. With Informal Edits, we wanted to smash together the classic old school bite of a west coast IPA with the soft, pillowy juice of a NEIPA for a hybridised IPA that carries the qualities of both. A heavy heavy 40kg dry hop charge of Citra and Columbus pairs up with a 10 minute whirlpool addition of even more Citra for an IPA that has equal parts soft and delicate notes, with super soft juicy notes to boot, with maximum drinkability in mind.

items.name: Little Patternist
items.desc:
Little Patternist
Range: Augment
Style: Pale Ale
ABV: 5.0%
Just like how we love to scale up our beers, we likewise love to challenge ourselves to see if we can fulfil the flavour intensity and body of one of our IPAs, but reeled back to a sessionable strength.
Patternist is and always has been the most underrated of the original three Augment beers, and we wanted to show it the serious love it deserves by showcasing those incredible El Dorado and Simcoe mango and pineapple notes, backed up with earthy bitterness, all condensed down into a super crushable, mega sessionable beer; perfected for sharing good times with (socially distanced) pals.

items.name: Movies In The Jacuzzi
items.desc:
Movies in the Jacuzzi
Range: Augment
Style: Guava India Pale Ale
ABV: 6.4%
It’s back again! We first brewed Movies before lockdown as a keg only beer and an experiment into more expansive fruit additions to our beers. Named in honour of one of our favourite movie villains – Back to the Future Part II’s Biff Tannen, this beer is pure Lally down to a T. We’ve mixed up one of our usual IPAs with masses of Guava added during fermentation. Padded out with a generous helping of dextrin and oat malts to bring the sweetness up to the next level, and dry-hopped with Amarillo and Chinook hops to bring a little bit of pine and a tropical complexity on board, this is a beer that best displays the talents of our wonderful head brewer.

items.name: Surfshirt
items.desc:
Surfshirt
Range: Augment
Style: Pale Ale w/Kveik
ABV: 5.2%
As a brewery that loves to push our own boundaries of what we’re capable of brewing, we really get a kick out of putting little twists on those super sessionable pale ales we’re such huge fans of here at Polly’s HQ, and Surfshirt was no exception.
With every brewer’s favourite super yeast on show, Surfshirt is a step up on our usual smashable pales thanks to our use of Kveik in the fermenting process. Subtle, spicy orange notes meld together incredibly with pithy grapefruit and tropical juice from the Champions League pairing of Azacca and Citra in this super smashable pale specifically designed with enough complexity to keep you coming back for more.

items.name: The Weekend Radio
items.desc:
The Weekend Radio
Range: Augment
Style: India Pale Ale
ABV: 6.8%
It’s back once again! We harp on all the time about how much we love the old school here at Polly’s whilst simultaneously embracing the new school. It comes as no surprise then that we noticed we had an absolute load of old school C hops in our cold store and a gap in our brew plans needing to be filled for release at the end of July.
A fiendish plot came to fruition when we created The Weekend Radio; a five C-hop showcase of everything old school, featuring heavyweights Citra, Columbus, Centennial, Chinook and Cascade, all wrapped up in our new school fermentation techniques. The result is an IPA packed to the nines with strong citrus notes, but maximum drinkability and softness, echoing the OG craft beer titans, but sitting firmly in the present.
